feed.title: SWAG Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SWAG: 2.11.0-ls309
entry.content:
LinuxServer Changes:

Fix perms on the generated priv-fullchain-bundle.pem.

PIP Changes:

Updating PIP version of certbot to 2.11.0

entry.title: New release for SWAG: 2.11.0-ls310

entry.title: New release for SWAG: 2.11.0-ls311
entry.content:
LinuxServer Changes:

Rebase to Alpine 3.20. Remove deprecated Google Domains certbot plugin. Existing users should update their nginx confs to avoid http2 deprecation warnings.

PIP Changes:

Updating PIP version of certbot to 2.11.0
